titles.title: Expressing support for the Haitian people and their Constitution, rule of law, and commitment to democratic principles.
Expressing support for the Haitian people and their Constitution, rule of law, and commitment to democratic principles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere, Civilian Security and Trade.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the violence that took place in the Senate of Haiti on September 11, 2019, expresses support for the Haitian people and their constitution, and reaffirms the U.S.-Haiti partnership.
